channel.title: Reloading .CFG files
channel.description: Can anyone give me a command to reload all the cfg files?

item.title: Reloading .CFG files
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“Lusfr, post:3, topic:176825”]This is what loads them

NPCHandler() { for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) { npcs[i] = null; } for (int i = 0; i < maxListedNPCs; i++) { NpcList[i] = null; } for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCDrops; i++) { NpcDrops[i] = null; } misc.print("Loading npcs... "); loadNPCList("npc.cfg"); misc.print("drops... "); loadNPCDrops("npcdrops.cfg"); misc.print("spawn list..."); loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg"); misc.println("done!"); }
and it’s in npchandler.[/quote]

so wouldnt it look like this?

if (command.startsWith("reload") && playerRights >= 3) { NPCHandler:NPCHandler(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Reloading .CFG files
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

This is what loads them

NPCHandler() { for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) { npcs[i] = null; } for (int i = 0; i < maxListedNPCs; i++) { NpcList[i] = null; } for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCDrops; i++) { NpcDrops[i] = null; } misc.print("Loading npcs... "); loadNPCList("npc.cfg"); misc.print("drops... "); loadNPCDrops("npcdrops.cfg"); misc.print("spawn list..."); loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg"); misc.println("done!"); }
and it’s in npchandler.

Read full topic

item.title: Reloading .CFG files
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Make whatever is using the CFG call the CFG so whatever edits you make within the CFG it will implement itself without the use of re-running the server. GL

Read full topic
